Jafnee Jesmee

BSc Computer Science Graduate

About Me

Hello! My name is Jafnee and welcome to my website.

I'm a recent graduate with an Upper Second Class Honours BSc in Computer Science from Aberystwyth University, with proven experience in developing high quality desktop, mobile and web-based applications.

My favourite programming language is currently Python. My working knowledge of other programming languages also include Java (with Android), JavaScript, PHP as well as Ruby.

Outside of programming I enjoy building desktop computers and often get the chance to do just that by helping choose the best value for money components and assembling them afterwards. This interest of mine got started after I assembled my first computer, at the age of 12.

I am currently pursuing 3D computer graphics as a hobby through the use of Blender to learn skills such as 3D modelling, texturing and rendering. I also infrequently post updates about projects I've undertaken on my blog.
